title: I have 6 cgpa till 6th sem and still my 2 backlogs yet to be added is there any scope for college placements not a single company has come yet for placement with cgpa as 6 .please help! And let me know if someone with 6cgpa got tier 1 job.

comments.body:
>is there any scope for college placements
Mostly no.


>let me know if someone with 6cgpa got tier 1 job.
Lol.

Also, are you aware that your post/comments history is visible to everyone?

Well, better late than never to realize that every action (or inaction in this case) has consequences.

It is unlikely you can do anything to improve CGPA before on campus placements. What I would suggest is that you introspect on what you really want to do (was your low CGPA out of laziness,  or not liking the course?) and then work towards it. 

Right now, i think what would work for you is working your butt off for the next year and then off-campus placements or studying for and getting into an MBA course through an entrance test.

Don't give up hope! While there's no easy fix, you can always put in the work to improve from where you are.
So yes I got tier 1 job !
